p: The percentages of stingless bee products in the beehive are still unknown; it supposed to be varied according to the species. Generally, propolis is main content of stingless bee hive, regardless the species, as the hive is constructed with it [ 17]. A study on nine Trigona species reported that the hive products of those species were 63.7% propolis, 20.9% beebread and 15.4% honey [ 18]. Furthermore, the proportion of use for each stingless bee product in the medicinal/commercial industry is also unknown.
